Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Class ViewObservable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoardSceneController, Cli, ColorSceneController, ConnectSceneController, FirstPlayerSceneController, GodsSceneController, Gui, LobbySceneController, LoginSceneController, MenuSceneController, PlayersNumberSceneController, SceneController 
public abstract class ViewObservable
extends java.lang.Object
Custom observable class that can be observed by implementing the ViewObserver interface and registering as listener.
